title: Laid 2 Rest: Two Halves of a Whole
description: Take heed, Reader! Not just anyone can comprehend this books meaning and fewer will understand my internal struggle… my war, constantly brewing from within. If you have never felt the devil kiss your skin, endured a loss so profound... your heart wept tears, or watched yourself shatter beyond repair, as you grasp onto the tiniest flicker of hope in an endless sea of black, then this journey with me may not be intended for you at this time. So beware, for this was solely written for current sufferers, fellow survivors, and for anyone that has yet to find their voice.I am Jasmine Rain Wynn and this is my story…
author: Melanie    Rose
